00038 namespace affxexp

00041 /*! Stores the contents of a EXP file. */
00042 class CEXPFileData
00043 {
00044 public:
00045         /*! Constructor */
00046         CEXPFileData();
00047 
00048         /*! Destructor */
00049         ~CEXPFileData();
00050 
00051 protected:
00052         /*! The name of the EXP file */
00053         std::string m_strFileName;
00054 
00055         /*! The array type in the EXP file */
00056         std::string m_strArrayType;
00057 
00058         /*! A list of scan parameters. */
00059         TagValuePairTypeList m_Scan;
00060 
00061         /*! A list of hyb parameters. */
00062         TagValuePairTypeList m_Hyb;
00063 
00064         /*! A list of sample parameters. */
00065         TagValuePairTypeList m_Sample;
00066 
00067 public:
00068         /*! Sets the file name.
00069          *
00070          * @param name The name of the EXP file.
00071          */
00072         void SetFileName(const char *name) { m_strFileName = name; }
00073 
00074         /*! Gets the file name.
00075          *
00076          * @return The file name.
00077          */
00078         std::string GetFileName() const { return m_strFileName; }
00079 
00080         /*! Gets the array type.
00081          *
00082          * @return The probe array type in the mask file.
00083          */
00084         std::string GetArrayType() const { return m_strArrayType; }
00085 
00086         /*! Sets the array type.
00087          *
00088          * @param arrayType The probe array type.
00089          */
00090         void SetArrayType(const char *arrayType) { m_strArrayType = arrayType; }
00091 
00092         /*! Reads the contents of the file.
00093          *
00094          * @return True if successful
00095          */
00096         bool Read();
00097 
00098         /*! Checks for the existance of a file.
00099          *
00100          * @return True if the file exists
00101          */
00102         bool Exists();
00103 
00104         /*! Clears memory associated with the class */
00105         void Clear();
00106 
00107         /*! Gets the list of scan parameters.
00108          * @return The list of scan parameters.
00109          */
00110         TagValuePairTypeList &GetScanParameters() { return m_Scan; }
00111 
00112         /*! Gets the list of hyb parameters.
00113          * @return The list of hyb parameters.
00114          */
00115         TagValuePairTypeList &GetHybParameters() { return m_Hyb; }
00116

00119          */
00120         TagValuePairTypeList &GetSampleParameters() { return m_Sample; }
